entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0207.10724] The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 270,839,000. This concept is used to report the fair value of investments for the pnnt:ControlledAndNonControlledAffiliatesMember affiliation. The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 303,139,000 that includes the member pnnt:ControlledAndNonControlledAffiliatesMember but also has additional members. This value is used to report the fair value of investments for the following dimensions us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerNameAxis=pnnt:TransactionsRelatedFundedInvestmentsMember, us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerAffiliationAxis=pnnt:ControlledAndNonControlledAffiliatesMember. The value representing the fair value of investments in the pnnt:ControlledAndNonControlledAffiliatesMember affiliation is less than the value reported for the value 303,139,000 which is a subset of this affiliation. The value reported for the affiliation in aggregate should be more than or equal to the value reported for of 303,139,000. Please ensure that appropriate dimensions have been used to report these values.
Concept : us-gaap:InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue Value : 303,139,000 Period : 2023-09-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerNameAxis=pnnt:TransactionsRelatedFundedInvestmentsMember, us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerAffiliationAxis=pnnt:ControlledAndNonControlledAffiliatesMember
Rule Element Id:10724 Rule version: 28.0.0RC1 - pnnt-20240930.htm 45285

The value reported for the affiliation in aggregate should be more than or equal to the value reported for of 257,127,000. Please ensure that appropriate dimensions have been used to report these values.
Concept : us-gaap:InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue Value : 257,127,000 Period : 2023-09-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerNameAxis=pnnt:TransactionsRelatedFundedInvestmentsMember, us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerAffiliationAxis=us-gaap:InvestmentAffiliatedIssuerControlledMember
